website_summaries.verdict: These bags stand up to the challenge of masking odors and hold many diapers. An added bonus is that they fit multiple diaper pails.
pros: Made of very thick, durable material to ensure there’s no ripping
These bags come at a good value as they hold an abundance of diapers and last a long time
Bags harness the ability to mask odors well
Fits Ubbi Diaper pails and other systems
cons: Bags don’t have tabs or drawstrings for easy tying

customer_reviews.title: These bags are garbage! (Pun intended)
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never been confused by Something g so simple. After unrolling a bag from the roll, I attempted to open it up to place in the Ubbi pail and the bag split down the seam. Opened a second, same thing happened. After the third attempt, I grabbed a different roll of bags, thinking it was just a flaw in the roll... after splitting five bags I gave up trying any further. I was too annoyed with the situation to go through the work to return the purchase and angry that so much plastic was now wasted. Unless there’s some vital step to unfurling a garbage bag that I was never taught, I do not recommend these bags at all.
customer_reviews.author: ACE

customer_reviews.title: Awesomely thick and slightly textured; they're made extra tall so you can easily tie them off.
customer_reviews.text: I love these Ubbi plastic bags! They are much thicker than regular trash bags and slightly textured. I never worry about it breaking or tearing. Plus I love that the blue bags distinguish diaper waste from regular waste in my house. I bought them for my Ubbi stainless diaper pale. Bags are not required by the pales, but I like the convenience when it's time to change out. These bags are a perfect fit for the pale --and by 'perfect' I mean they still have plenty of room at the top to tie it off.
customer_reviews.author: Matt C.

customer_reviews.title: These will last forever! Great product!
customer_reviews.text: One pack of these have lasted more than a year! That's AMAZING! They are very sturdy and I'm so happy I read the reviews for this particular diaper dumpster and bags! Very pleased mama over here :). The only beef I have with these is that they have no scent. A literal bag of tiny human waste doesn't smell great so if the bags smelled a little better that might make changing the bag a little more tolerable. However even without a fresh flower scent I give these 5 stars!!
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great for durability
customer_reviews.text: We have been using these going on 2 years in our Ubbi pail. They fit in there great and we have never had an issue with them ripping when we remove the bags and our Ubbi is usually full when we empty it. After you tie the bag it does contain the smell, but if we have a full bag in our Ubbi and you open it, the smell does have the power to knock you off your feet. So don’t expect these bags to keep the diapers from smelling in the pail. They are great but they are not magic.
customer_reviews.author: Megan E

customer_reviews.title: Durable bags, last a long time-don’t hide smell.
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these because some reviews said they were magic at keeping the smell contained-that’s a big negative over here. I have one ubbi Paul I’ve used whatever bags with and one that has only ever been used with these and they both smell horrific inside even with nothing in it. So that’s a bummer. Still reeks whenever you open the pail to put a new diaper in and sometimes the smell lingers which is exactly what you are trying to avoid I thought. That said-they are durable trash bags and they do last a long time so I ordered another set because I’ve just accepted that the smell is unavoidable.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Lee

customer_reviews.title: This size refill lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.text: By far the best diaper pail system. For reference in terms of how long these bags will last you: we previously bought this size (75 pack x 3 cases) before our child was born, and didn't need to buy again for 14 months.
customer_reviews.author: Ed BTop Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: Worth it, buy them!
customer_reviews.text: So I love these, yes you could use regular bags, however these are not expensive. Worth the money bc if your like use you cram as many diapers in the pail and when you have to pull out the bag these are thicker and don't rip. I used a regular trash bag and it ripped and made a hug mess. Also they have a small scent to them, not bad, but just enough to help
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: doesn't contain stink, but doesn't tear
customer_reviews.text: Did not help with bad stink at all, same as using any bag. The UBBI pail was a terrible purchase as the stink is so strong every time you open to put a diaper in. The stink stays in the pail after removing the bag of diapers too, WAY more than other pails I've used! I've only had it for 4 weeks and only use it for newborn diapers, not gross, stinky diapers. I'm in shock that people like this product. The good thing about this bag is the bag is strong and doesn't tear easily.
customer_reviews.author: jump678

customer_reviews.title: A Must-Have Item!
customer_reviews.text: We have had complete success using these bags with our Ubbi pail. Last month, I decided to try just using plain (and obviously cheaper) kitchen-style garbage bags instead, and that was a big mistake! The smell was present for the first time ever. We've now switched back to the Ubbi bags and I have to say... they are WELL worth the cost! No odor issues at all!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Strong and last forever!
customer_reviews.text: It’s great that you can use any bag with the Unbi can. But I bought these right before the baby was born to have an easy no-think option for the first months and a year later we’re still not through them. That makes them a good value in my book. They’re fantastic! Nice thick plastic - I’ve never had a problem with leaks or tears and I’m pretty sure they help with smell too.
customer_reviews.author: bookends

customer_reviews.title: Great brand name bags for the brand name trash can
customer_reviews.text: This was the refills for the Ubi brand trashcan. That thing is awesome! The bags will rarely rip and only when removing the bag after really compressing the used diapers and overly packing the trash can. But it can take it. I don't think you need Ubi bags specifically if other bags have the same dimension.
customer_reviews.author: Justin C

customer_reviews.title: Best diaper pail bags!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are fantastic at keeping the odor inside the bag and not out in my house. They’re thicker than regular trash bags. They last a long time too. One pack lasted us just over a year.
customer_reviews.author: alyssamarie

customer_reviews.title: Strong plastic that never rips
customer_reviews.text: These are a must have if you have the ubbi diaper pail. There is not really a scent to them but they hold in odors within the pail. My toddler is two years old and we only use these bags. Over the last two years, I have never had a bag rip even when weighted down heavily.
customer_reviews.author: BFish

customer_reviews.title: 100% worth it!
customer_reviews.text: These Uppi plastic bags are great for any nursery! They trap the unpleasant scent of dirty diapers and last a long time. WARNING* - do not overfill the bags in the diaper pail. If this happens, the bags will rip and you will have a situation on your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Megan C.

customer_reviews.title: Just bags!
customer_reviews.text: A few bags have ripped inside the ubbi pail. The scent is very unnoticeable but does contain the smell for the most part. The bags do what they were intended for in the first place. A little pricy but we like them.
customer_reviews.author: Dan H

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Found a Ubbi diaper pail at a garage sale and purchased for our downstairs changing station. We got these bags and they work great. But it’s useful to know they’re not required for the diaper pail. A regular bag can also be used
customer_reviews.author: Ben Breckon

customer_reviews.title: Can’t use after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: It was good while it lasted which was less than 6 months. Always used their actual bags and I can’t even use it anymore because it has a strange nasty smell to it even when there is nothing in there - stinks up the whole room. I’ve tried to clean it out so many times and nothing works. So now I have to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: They need a better bag, this one sucks!
customer_reviews.text: These say they work great with the UBBI except they don’t. They don’t fit, you have to make your own awkward knot and figure out a way to wrap the bag around the inside on the pale, and it doesn’t stay up.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Danzer

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I would like
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because you get a decent amount for your money but they don’t seem to hold the scents in as well as the precious bags we had So I end up changing the bag more frequently. I probably won’t order them again....
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: The BEST diaper pail and bags out there
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed (strange I know) with our Ubbi diaper pail. We used a different diaper pail while on vacation this summer and the whole time I was missing our Ubbi! The bags are strong and keep odors contained. They are easy to separate and very easy to replace in the pail itself. I can't say enough good things about this diaper pail and the bags!!!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: MamadoesitbestTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: ... big that they allow way too much air around dirty diapers, which allows the odor to become so ...
customer_reviews.text: These bags are so big that they allow way too much air around dirty diapers, which allows the odor to become so unbelievably horrible we have to take the pail outside to empty it, and leave it outside overnight to air out. I give it a couple stars for the eco-friendly factor, but I'm really missing my Diaper Genie.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with these
customer_reviews.text: Will buy again. Great price. Very strong bags. Holds lots of diapers.
customer_reviews.author: Julia F.

customer_reviews.title: Prevents stinks
customer_reviews.text: I have a Ubbi diaper pail as well. When I open the pail to throw away the diaper I understand how effective the bag and the pail is together. There is completely no dirty diaper smell outside the pail. These bags are also easy to tie a know when disposing.
customer_reviews.author: Subha

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Comes with a lot on one roll. The durability seems great and the price for how many come in a pack is well worth it. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Marz Léon

customer_reviews.title: Buying special bags feels premium, but these are worth it
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, I'm not into the idea of proprietary bags but a box of these lasted us 13 months with a newborn and they seem worth the premium. Their ability to be stuffed to capacity with no risk of tearing (seriously, we've never ripped a bag and have abused the capacity of the pail many times) and their ability (along with the design of the pail) to contain odors is amazing. It's bad enough when a regular bag of garbage rips - a bag of soiled diapers would be a small ecological disaster.
customer_reviews.author: VasK

customer_reviews.title: I keeps down the smell
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, it does a great job of storing poopy diapers. Keeps the smell at bay, but lord help you when you pull the bag out and the vacuum releases a plume of stench. In all seriousness these bags are durable, rarely snag. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: tridetroit

customer_reviews.title: The bags do contain the smell however, I ALWAYS ...
customer_reviews.text: The bags do contain the smell however, I ALWAYS have a problem getting the bags out without tearing the bag on the "teeth/tabs" located on the lid. So I cannot let the pail get very full (which wastes space in the bag) and I have to tie the bag then turn the Ubbi over and shake the bag out. I have had this issue with all types of trash bags.
customer_reviews.author: Sass

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bags.
customer_reviews.text: Love these for my ubbi diaper pail. We have 4. These bags are very thick and durable. Will buy over and over.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Fanus

customer_reviews.title: Contains odor
customer_reviews.text: Bags do the job. Thick enough resisting breakage. Contains odor until container is opened.
customer_reviews.author: Commuter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Very durable. Easy to install in the canister. Haven't had a bag tear yet and been using them over a year.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Pibb

customer_reviews.title: I like the bags
customer_reviews.text: I like the bags. It helps to block at smells. I tried to use a cheaper brand and it was not as sturdy at all. The color makes it easy to find as well.
customer_reviews.author: F.D.H.

customer_reviews.title: Highest quality bag that never rips
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST bags. Really strong and never rip. I use them in the nursery AND kitchen now, too. They are designed to fit the Ubbi pail, so they don't fit my kitchen trash can perfectly, but so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: LEW

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These hold the smell better than regular garbage bags but nothing can contain the smell of some diapers. But these have never torn on us and the package lasted 9 Months!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Very durable. I was shocked at how much these bags can hold. The Ubbi diaper pail is the best and the bags are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great liners
customer_reviews.text: These are great, they come in a large quantity and are a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Charity Pranger

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Would rather these bags have a drawstring. These bags hold up well though they feel like they will break if you fill the pail with dirty diapers. They hold up well in the end
customer_reviews.author: LKP Tackett

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Great bags. My son is 3 months old and I still have so many bags.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, I recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Although you can use any bags for the Ubbi, I highly recommend these. They are very durable and the box lasts forever (8 months for us!).
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: These are absolutely worth buying!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! I understand that regular bags will work in the Ubbi, but these are extra strong, and no smell emanates from these at all! They are worth spending a little extra money on!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Must have for diaper pail
customer_reviews.text: As described fit the ubbi diaper pail great no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Albert

customer_reviews.title: Get this instead
customer_reviews.text: My twins are almost 2 and we just bought our 3rd box of bags. Recommending to all our new parent friends.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer 22

customer_reviews.title: Works for us!
customer_reviews.text: I find they dont leak smell, the backs are constructed well, dont tear and dont stretch. I prefer them to regular garbage bags.
customer_reviews.author: ByStf-RvwStf

customer_reviews.title: Huge fan!
customer_reviews.text: As a mom of twins we change these bags a lot & have had no issues! Keep the scent masked and are durable. Make sure you read how to put them in the ubbi- if not it will not mask the smell as well.
customer_reviews.author: Linds

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These fit the bin perfectly, but the stuff we throw in them really stinks.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: While you don't NEED special bags for the Ubbi, these just fit so well.
customer_reviews.author: Kailynne Degan

customer_reviews.title: Good to have
customer_reviews.text: If you have an Ubbi these bags are a good value.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Works great, will continue buying these
customer_reviews.text: Durable, works great, I'm on my second or third order, I don't have any bad odors, will continue using these!
customer_reviews.author: grandmasterv

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced and perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Best bags for the best diaper pail I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great price, lasts a long time even with two ...
customer_reviews.text: Great price, lasts a long time even with two diaper pales in the house. Ubbi diaper pales and bags are definitely worth the price, we never have to worry about smelling dirty diapers and when we take them out the diaper pale on its own doesn't stink, it's awesome! Sticking with Ubbi!
customer_reviews.author: Cheshire Cat

customer_reviews.title: These bags work great! They fit perfectly in the ubbi pail and ...
customer_reviews.text: These bags work great! They fit perfectly in the ubbi pail and block odors when the bag is removed from the can. I will buy these again rather than using a kitchen trash bag.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bags
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t trap odor all that great - one dirty diaper and it really smells, but sturdy bags and do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Really masks the smell
customer_reviews.text: All the bags smell great and cover the smell of the constant stinky diapers.
customer_reviews.author: Rubi Soto

customer_reviews.title: Weak!!! Rip 50% of the time.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe how weak these bags are. Every other bag I open up tears and I have to reuse it. I have no idea what makes these better than a kitchen trash bag, but kitchen trash bags are half the price and twice as durable. These are sad.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These bags mask the smell of dirty diapers and this is the BEST value we have found anywhere! Can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Barnes

customer_reviews.title: attractive, but.....
customer_reviews.text: It does keep the odors contained, and it does use ordinary kitchen white trash bags; but the lid hinge broke. It is a very heavy lid and the plastic hinge is not up to the job.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Gee

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and sturdy bags
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, contained the smell, but adding extra baking soda also helps
customer_reviews.author: Dagho07

customer_reviews.title: Repeat buyer
customer_reviews.text: Repeat buyer. Great quality and value. Will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: runs with scissors

customer_reviews.title: There ok
customer_reviews.text: I buy them because they fit my trash can't but they dont keep sent in. 100% wish it did. But over all they ok
customer_reviews.author: Luciano P.

customer_reviews.title: 13 months of poop!
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement I bought after almost 13 months, so this pack of bags can hold about 13 months of your baby's dirty diapers.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for the ubbi trash can
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for the ubbi trash can. Good quality. I’ve only experienced tears in the bags when they are packed too full.
customer_reviews.author: KimberlyMom

customer_reviews.title: Great bags to contain endless baby poop
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and contains tons of smelly diaper very well
customer_reviews.author: Phinn

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Uber Ruby booby Ubi
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for the Uber we've been using it for years
customer_reviews.author: Neversugar dot Com

customer_reviews.title: Love the Ubbi
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!! Lasted to 15 months before we had to buy a new pack for our little one who’s is daycare 5 days a week.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Schultze

customer_reviews.title: they fit the ubbi well, keep scents at bay ...
customer_reviews.text: they fit the ubbi well, keep scents at bay, and while rolled double as a baby distraction when im changing him.
customer_reviews.author: Jay L.

customer_reviews.title: No smell and no leaks!
customer_reviews.text: These things are incredible! These blow the competitor out of the water!
customer_reviews.author: christian neal

customer_reviews.title: Strong bags
customer_reviews.text: Fit the Ubbi perfectly. Can hold probably 30 dirty diapers before needing to be disposed of.
customer_reviews.author: Maux

customer_reviews.title: ... was because i thought in the beginning they were good. I bought these because I have the diaper ...
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I even gave it the two stars was because i thought in the beginning they were good. I bought these because I have the diaper pail to go with it but more than 7 times these bags have popped while taking them out of the ubbi, I'll never buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: These are the WORST trash bags I’ve ever used. You’d be better off getting some generic from the grocery store. I would say 1 in 3 bags in unusable because it tears as your trying to open it up. Such a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Pfleger

customer_reviews.title: Good for the ubbi pail
customer_reviews.text: A little expensive for what it is, but one package lasts almost a year, so it’s not bad. Never had one break or rip.
customer_reviews.author: bommar2

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I was thinking about buying cheaper random bags for value but was given this item as a gift at my baby shower. At 18 months old now, I just now finished this box! They lasted forever!! My husband and I joked they would last till he's 2! Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these bags
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags. Definitely help contain the smell and they hold quite a bit. They are pretty strong and hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa T

customer_reviews.title: Bags work well
customer_reviews.text: These bags work well with the Ubbi diaper pail and help reduce the odor in the pail. Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: sisgretch

customer_reviews.title: The bag rips easily and it's not ideal when you have it stuffed ...
customer_reviews.text: Why I bought this product: I bought these to go with my ubbi diaper pail. How the product worked: The bag rips easily and it's not ideal when you have it stuffed with diapers. Suggest getting regular diaper bags that dont rip as easily. Any tall diaper bag works with the ubbi pail.
customer_reviews.author: flutterby1

customer_reviews.title: I will purchase Again.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product for me. Discreet Good fragrance Sturdy bags
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: We love the ubbi and these bags last longer than any product we bought from Diaper Genie
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Ella

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit the Sunni perfectly. Been almost 2 weeks of newborn diapers and no smell!
customer_reviews.author: JRubbo

customer_reviews.title: Good Value That Lasts
customer_reviews.text: I have the Ubbi Diaper pale. I had this package of bags for over a year. (I pack them so tightly). It’s a good value for how long they last.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great price and they fit perfectly in Ubbi diaper can
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They work.
customer_reviews.text: Thes work create for the Ubbi. I have also started using them in my kitchen for my combined trash/recycle center. They are fairly tough, but not stretchy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It fits the container nicely that I ordered it for
customer_reviews.text: The bag fits the container I ordered. It appears to be durable. I like the light scent.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: These bags are amazing. They cost more than just using regular garbage ...
customer_reviews.text: These bags are amazing. They cost more than just using regular garbage bags, yet I keep ordering more because they are sturdy, and just fit the Ubbi diaper pail perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Pax

customer_reviews.title: Enough for a year’s worth of diapers!
customer_reviews.text: These lasted me the entire first year of my son’s life! Much better than needing to purchase specific diaper refills
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Good Bags
customer_reviews.text: Although you can use the Ubbi pail with your own bags, these are worth purchasing. They are much thicker than kitchen garbage bags which helps reduce odor and they come out of the pail without getting stuck on the little lip on the inside. I will continue to purchase Ubbi bags for my diaper pail.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mama

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were great for the Ubbi pail and the three count pack lasted us 10 months! Just re-ordered!
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: did not like color. the regular bags fit better and are easier to install.
customer_reviews.author: NAYNA SHAH

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bags
customer_reviews.text: These are some strong bags, and great price. I think one box is going to last me along time.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: This product is okay. It serves the purpose but ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is okay. It serves the purpose but doesn’t keep the stink at bay. I will use them because they are just okay but don’t plan to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cat litter pail- dual use, waiting for grandchildren!
customer_reviews.text: Love the Ubbi pail for my cats soiled litter. No odor in his area, small foot print, easy to change out bags and keeps everything neat and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Full cart

customer_reviews.title: Good, thick bags.
customer_reviews.text: You *can* use a regular bag with the Ubbi pail but I've never seen a 7.5 gal trash bag that I trusted very much. These feel industrial-strength thick.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: They're durable but they could hold the smell a little better

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Fit much better than regular trash bags & still holds a lot of size 2 & 3 diapers

customer_reviews.title: Love these bags and our ubbi pail
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags and our ubbi pail! Works great with no smell only to change the bag which is expected
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Diminished quality
customer_reviews.text: These bags are much thinner than they used to be when we first bought them about 2 years ago. They rip very easily. Very disappointed. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: You could probably use a regular trash bag instead of ...
customer_reviews.text: You could probably use a regular trash bag instead of these, but these fit well and have not torn when removing from the pale.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and does the Job
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product. It's just smaller than I expected but definitely does the job!

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t find these in ang store since they closed Babies R Us.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This pack lasted me a year before I needed to replace it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thick liners are perfect with the diaper pail. Highly recommend. Keeps the smell out!

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Great price for how many you get. Fits in my ubbi diaper pail easy to install and can hold a lot of diapers. Very strong bags.

customer_reviews.title: Good value, fits the bin, no tears!
customer_reviews.text: Lasted me past 18 months with first baby so naturally I repurchased this 3-pack of bag refills for my second baby!
customer_reviews.author: la_sirena

product_meta.title: Ubbi Disposable Diaper Pail Plastic Bags, Made with Recyclable Material, True Value Pack, 75 Count, 13-Gallon
product_meta.description:
Style:Plastic Bags, 75 ct.The Ubbi Plastic Bags are option for the Ubbi diaper pail, although not a requirement. Depending on your need, you can choose between a single box of 25 bags or a convenient triple value pack of 75 bags. Each unscented bag has a capacity of 13-gallon and is made of 20% recycled material. These plastic bags aren’t a must, just a plus!

Enter the world of Ubbi where innovative products are designed and created with parents and children in mind. Under the Ubbi name, you will find unique, quality products that are easy to use, helping to simplify parents’ lives while keeping babies as happy and safe as can be.

Thanks to its award-winning can of steel, Ubbi is now a recognized brand worldwide. The Ubbi diaper pail is renowned for its ability to achieve maximum odor control and appreciated for offering the convenience and value of utilizing any standard trash bag or reusable cloth liner, a breakthrough in the diaper disposal market. With the same customer focused philosophy and innovative design capabilities, the Ubbi brand is now expanding its signature diapering selection and extending into the feeding category. A wide range of Ubbi branded products is now available for today’s modern parents that are looking for stylish and functional baby essentials.

From concept to final creation, the Ubbi team works together every step of the way to bring the best in design and value. The input of every member of the team is taken into account in the development of the Ubbi products, but consumer input is the most important as customer satisfaction is our primary goal.
feature_bullets: Ubbi Plastic Bags contain 20% recycled material
Convenient bags have a 13 gallon capacity
Includes 75 Ubbi Diaper Pail plastic bags total
Compatible with the Ubbi diaper pail, but fits many others
Ubbi diaper pails do not require special refill bags, but these convenient bags are an eco-friendly option
